AI Agent engineered for Enterprise software development
Understands your codebase & context
Refact.ai deeply analyzes your company's repository, fetching relevant data for each task—ensuring smarter suggestions and more accurate automation.
Workspace Codebase Databases Files Documentation Web ...
Integrates with developers' tools
Connect with GitHub, GitLab, Docker, PostgreSQL, MySQL, and more—handling related operations autonomously, mimicking your workflow.
    
Leverages the best AI models
Choose from industry-leading LLMs—including Claude 4, GPT-4o, Grok, Gemini, DeepSeek, Mistral and more—or switch models to optimize performance.
    
Fine-tuned for your company
Train Refact.ai on your specific coding style and stack, improving accuracy over time—unlike generic AI models.
See Refact.ai in action
Empower your engineers with Refact.ai Agent
Technical leaders choose Refact.ai Agent to empower engineers to work faster, onboard quickly, and ship products without delays
01
Understands large codebases
No matter how complex your repositories are, Refact.ai Agent selects the right context to deliver accurate solutions.

Learns from each interaction and feedback with your developers, updating its memory and becoming smarter over time.

Builds a shared memory from developers' interactions, speeding up collaboration across your team.
Get dedicated support from our team—available at every stage, from setup to fine-tuning and beyond.
Try Refact.ai today
The only Open-source AI Code Assistant for Enterprise recognized by Gartner
With Refact.ai, users can choose from a wide range of models both for cloud and self-hosted versions, allowing them to tailor the AI assistant to their specific needs, balancing performance, accuracy and computational requirements.

SaaS

AWS
